Posts.Content: Hi. I had DCIS and a double mastectomy with reconstruction over one year ago using the tug flap procedure. Today I found a lump in my left armpit. I called my doctor. Left a message. It's Friday so.... I was wondering what your outcome was?Â  I had a panic attack earlier. This better be something simple.
Posts.Title: Found lump under arm 5 months after double mastectomy and lymph node...
